items.title: Notre Dame is OUT of the College Football Playoff
items.summary: The college football playoff committee is the most corrupt body in all of sports (and with FIFA that’s saying something). As the playoff rankings were unveiled we saw no movement in the top 8, and then it got ridiculous. Notre Dame is OUT of the college football playoff. Alabama, who was just blown out by […]

items.title: Notre Dame Fan Discussion: Conference Championship Weekend
items.summary: The college football regular season is over and done, and here comes the postseason. Obviously as an Independent, Notre Dame won’t be participating this weekend, but the impact from some of those games could be massive. items.title: Notre Dame Football Stats: The ACC-Notre Dame Team Comparison
items.summary: This part of the ACC-Notre Dame stats series is focused on team-level stats. Offense Points Scored The Irish would’ve been ranked first in the ACC for points scored per game. The team averaged 42 points per game during the 2025-26 season. Pitt (8-4) was a ways off at #2 with 35.1 points scored per game. Stanford […]

items.title: EARNED 5-STAR PODCAST: Notre Dame and the College Football Playoff Conspiracy
items.summary: Joshua and Jude celebrate Brendan’s birthday by opening the pod portal without him, because the Notre Dame Football universe doesn’t stop. In this episode: And MUCH more weaved inand out of the show.  Please RATE and REVIEW! All reviews left on Apple Podcasts will be read on the next Earned 5-Star Podcast. Go Irish!

items.title: 2026 National Signing Day: Notre Dame Football Commitment and NLI Tracker
items.summary: One by one, the Notre Dame Fighting Irish will add new members to its football family during the early signing period for the 2026 recruiting class. items.title: Notre Dame 76, Missouri 71: The Irish needed it, and took it
items.summary: Without exaggeration, tonight’s contest against the Missouri Tigers represented the most important game of the Micah Shrewsberry era to-date. Expectations are for the program to be in the hunt for an NCAA tournament bid, and for that to be a realistic possibility, there needs to be a quality non-conference win to point to. Beating Houston […]

items.title: Notre Dame moves to #10 because of college football playoff politics
items.summary: The penultimate set of College Football Playoff rankings were released and the committee decided to move Notre Dame down to #10 and Alabama up to #9. If you’ve been paying attention to me over the past few weeks — this is pretty much what I expected from the committee. They want Bama in the playoff […]
